<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=745) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 231 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12)

**Prerequisites**
[Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=742)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from the wizard archetype, add two common spells of that level to your spellbook.

<title level="2">Basic Wizard Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Arcane Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=747), [Expert Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=748)
